Title: Add single or multiple in-stock products (with working link in success message)
Precondition: User logged in, product in stock
Steps: Navigate to product page, click "Add to Cart" for 1 or more units, click link in success message
Test Date: Product stock ≥ 3, add 1 unit and 3 units
Expected Result: Product added successfully. Success message displayed with working link to cart

Title: Add an out-of-stock product
Precondition: User logged in, product out of stock
Steps: Select out-of-stock product, click "Add to Cart"
Expected Result: System blocks action. Error message displayed: Product is out of stock

Title: Success message without link
Precondition: User logged in, product in stock
Expected Result: Success message displayed but no link provided; user must navigate to cart manually

Title: Success message with broken link
Precondition: User logged in, product in stock
Steps: Add product to cart, click link in success message
Expected Result: Success message displayed, but link does not redirect (broken)

Title: “Add to Cart” button not working
Precondition: User logged in, product in stock

Title: Add product as not-logged-in customer
Steps: Navigate to product page, click "Add to Cart"
Expected Result: User redirected to login page / prompted to log in

Title: Add more than available quantity
Precondition: User logged in, product in stock
Steps: Enter quantity > stock, click "Add to Cart"
Expected Result: System blocks action. Error message displayed: Requested quantity exceeds available stock.

ID: Test Cases – Add Product to Cart
1-Logged-in customer adds a single or multiple in-stock products → Product added successfully. Success message displayed with working link to cart.
2-Logged-in customer tries to add an out-of-stock product → System blocks action. Error message displayed.
3-Logged-in customer adds a product → Success message displayed without link.
4-Logged-in customer adds a product → Success message displayed with broken link (does not redirect).
5-Logged-in customer tries to add a product but the “Add to Cart” button does not work → Button unresponsive, product not added.
6-Not logged-in customer tries to add a product → User is redirected to login page / prompted to log in.
7-Logged-in customer tries to add more than the available quantity of a product → System blocks action. Error message displayed
